name: Mmm Final
description:
As a simple interesting game,you can touch screen to complete play.

As a hairball , you want to explore the wider world , but the road is very dangerous on the road there are a variety of organs.


You need to carefully avoid the various institutions:some agencies will move,some organ will rotate,you control their travel route to avoid being hit by authority.

Only need to slide your finger , you can control the hair ball movement , simple operation can explain how this game is for all ages.


MMM Finger is a good game,that you will love it.
